narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Landmark Recovery of Carmel LLC is a Substance Abuse Rehabilitation Facility provider based in Bluffton, IN. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $21.1M in Medicaid payments across 62K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $21.1M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
